news.title: DG Matrix raises $60M to make data center power smarter
news.summary: The startup is making solid-state transformers capable of intelligently aggregating power from a number of different sources before sending it to data center racks.

news.title: Intellexa’s Predator spyware used to hack iPhone of journalist in Angola, research says
